General.Name: Xinjiang Haoyuan Natural Gas Co Ltd
General.Description: Xinjiang Haoyuan Natural Gas Co., Ltd. engages in the transmission, distribution, and sale of natural gas in China. The company operates long-distance natural gas pipelines, urban high and medium pressure municipal pipelines, gas stations, CNG refueling master stations, and CNG refueling sub-stations, as well as CNG tractors. It also engages in natural gas home installation business. The company was formerly known as Aksu Haoyuan Natural Gas Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Xinjiang Haoyuan Natural Gas Co., Ltd. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Aksu, China.
